name: Coconut Cream Cake
steps: Preheat oven to 350. Grease and flour bundt pan
Mix together cake  mix, eggs, oil, water, and flavoring. Beat for 2 minutes and pour into bundt cake pan. Bake according to box or until toothpick comes clean.

In medium bowl, combine coconut cream with sweetened condensed milk and stir until smooth. When cake comes out of the oven, poke holes everywhere (I use a chopstick). Pour milk mixture over holes in cake.
Let cake sit for about 1/2 hour (let the milk soak in well) and then invert onto a serving dish. Chill for several hours or freeze.
Before serving, whip the cream with sugar, vanilla and almond until stiff. Spread over cake. Can sprinkle with toasted flaked coconut.
